com.experian.bis.api.lib.businessservices.service

Class BusinessService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.experian.bis.api.lib.businessservices.service.BusinessService
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BankruptcyService, BusinessFactsService, CollectionsService, CorporateLinkageService, CorporateRegistrationsService, CreditStatusService, FraudShieldsService, HeadersService, JudgmentsService, LegalCollectionsSummariesService, LiensService, RiskDashboardsService, ScoresService, SearchService, TradesService, UCCFilingsService

    public abstract class BusinessService
extends java.lang.Object
    BusinessService is the parent class of all the Business Service Classes. This is an abstract class. It has implementation of some of the important common methods used by all other Business Service Classes.

    • Method Detail

      • getRawServiceResponse

        public java.lang.String getRawServiceResponse()
        Returns the Raw String Response received from the Business Service. This method returns the service response, even in case of an exception when the service has returned an error.
        Returns:
        rawServiceResponse

      • getServiceUrl

        protected java.lang.String getServiceUrl()
                                  throws BISServiceException

        Throws:

      • callService

        protected void callService(java.lang.String requestUrl,
                           java.lang.String requestBody,
                           java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> requestHeaders,
                           RequestMethod requestMethod)
                    throws BISServiceException
        This is one of the most important methods of BusinessService class. This method actually makes a REST call to the Experian Service based on the given parameters and sets the Service response to rawServiceResponse
        Parameters:
        requestUrl -
        requestBody -
        requestHeaders -
        requestMethod -
        Throws:
        BISServiceException
